						</Service>
						<Service SSR_Code="CTCE" SegmentNumber="A">

						</Service>

							</VendorPrefs>
						</Service>
					</SpecialServiceInfo>
				</SpecialService>
			</SpecialReqDetails>
			<PostProcessing>
